title: Laptop dropping Wifi randomly
body: Hey does anyone know how to fix laptops dropping your wifi connection? It's happening a lot recently. I'll be in champ select and it'll drop connection but will keep me in there and start without me even if I lost connection. Any help would be great thanks.

replies.body:
While WiFi is convenient, it's not recommended for games that require a really stable connection like League. We actually did a really good comparison of WiFi VS Ethernet in [this article.](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/page/ethernet-vs-wifi-ping-packets-playing-better) These types of drops can often be caused by conflicting WiFi network or issues with your router or wireless adapter. 

I strongly recommend working through the steps inside our [Connection Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) in order to resolve this issue. Let me know how well those steps worked for you.
